title: Melf's Acid Arrow
content:
ses:

Wizard Arcane Trickster (Rogue) Circle of the Land (Druid)

Melf's Acid Arrow can be cast by using the following Items:

Scroll of Acid Arrow Melf's First Staff

Melf's Acid Arrow Tips & Notes

Melf's Acid Arrow is a Ranged Spell Attack and therefore targets Armour Class. Empowered Evocation does not add damage to the delayed Acid Damage this spell deals.

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Arcane Lock ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blindness ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic
